author: Amy

review: I was skeptical at first.  I previously used a Chromecast, Roku, and home built PC to stream my media.  After several months of use, the Amazon TV is now my favorite device.  I use it with Plex to cast my local media to my TV.  Amazon TV is fast, responsive, and turns on quickly.  In my several months of ownership I have only reset it one time.  In contrast I kept resetting my Roku device almost every other day.  This is a great solution if you don't have a SmartTV and want to stream your Plex local media.  I rarely use the Amazon services, but use it now and then to catch some of the HBO shows on Prime.  It would be a perfect 5 star if it allowed you to use the voice search on all apps.
author: Rivers8

review: It's user friendly and it works seamlessly. We've only had it for a couple of weeks but there haven't been any problems so far. We cut the cable cord 5 months ago and haven't regretted it. It's so much faster and sharper than the gaming system we were using for Netflix and Hulu. Now that we've added Amazon prime, there's even more to watch if we want too. I love having Youtube that doesn't buffer on our tv. The music stations are great too. If you have a Bose sound system and have problems getting it to "talk" to the Fire TV call them up and they'll be happy to help you.
